text.value: Enter the name of the recorder (e.g. Clarice Starling)
Enter the site name with property prefix
Collect the location GPS with the mobile device.
Enter latitude (decimal degrees) for the site location.
Enter longitude (decimal degrees) for the site location.
Select a land type for the site description.
Soil and position of new site:
You selected Land system , sourced from . The description is:
You selected Land system: , sourced from . The description is:
Select one or multiple feral animals.
Enter any other feral species not in list.
Is the clearing new or historic?
Is the clearing selective or full felling?
Select the types of erosion present
What is the erosion severity for scalding?
What is the erosion stability for scalding?
What is the erosion severity for windsheeting?
What is the erosion stability for windsheeting?
What is the erosion severity for watersheeting?
What is the erosion stability for watersheeting?
What is the erosion severity for rilling?
What is the erosion stability for rilling?
What is the erosion severity for gullying?
What is the erosion stability for gullying?
What is the level of greenness or maturity in the pasture?
Rank the amount of biomass present at the site
What percentage of the current season's growth is grazed?
Assign a condition score to the site.
Collect the site GPS with the mobile device.
Enter longitude (decimal degrees) for the site.
Enter longitude (decimal degrees) for the site.
This form contains 'other' weed species selections.

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Please enter the full name, First name and surname should start with a capital letter and there should be a space between them.

bind.relevant: selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'B_property_outside') or selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'D_property_outside') or selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'G_property_outside') or selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'K_property_outside') or selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'NAS_property_outside') or selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'P_property_outside') or selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'R_property_outside') or selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'SAS_property_outside') or selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'SP_property_outside') or selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'TC_property_outside') or selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'VR_property_outside') or selected( /RLM_Integrated_Site_v2/PROP/PROPERTY , 'NP_prop_new')

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Site numbers must contain 3 capital letters followed by 2/3 numbers followed by a capital A.

select1.hint: Record the name of the recording officer, if not listed select other and type in the name.
Use mobile device unless device fails to acquire a signal.

input.hint: Should be negative and have 5-6 decimal places (i.e. -12.12345). On a Samsung Tab press the ".-"button twice for the "-" character.

select1.hint: Only select if it is close enough to impact upon the site.
You are in an area where the fire region in unknown.
To stop entering species swipe left OR select 'End selection'. NOTE: Scroll down to enter weed distribution and density.

input.hint: Use the following image to estimate density.

select1.hint: The amount of weeds identified within the previously identified area.
To stop entering species swipe left OR select 'End selection'.

input.hint: NOTE: Scroll down to enter weed distribution and density.
Use the following image to estimate density.

select1.hint: The amount of weeds identified within the previously identified area.
To stop entering species swipe left OR select 'End selection'.

input.hint: NOTE: Scroll down to enter weed distribution and density.
Use the following image to estimate density.

select1.hint: The amount of weeds identified within the previously identified area.

Make an assessment based on the relative greenness of the bulk of the pasture biomass (or cover). Thus, if the majority of the biomass is drying off while a small proportion is dry, the overall greenness score is 'drying off'.
If site is in poor condition and pasture growth was limited by the season, look for preferred and semi-palatable species growing in protected or favoured areas and determine level of utilisation.

input.hint: Report an issue with this form to the developers.
Should be negative and have 5-6 decimal places (i.e. -12.12345). On a Samsung Tab press the ".-"button twice for the "-" character.
Before uploading this form to the Aggregate server you must convert to botanical names in the required format (Genus-species).
